meanings.definition: Occurring in an indefinitely large series; very many.
meanings.sent1: After the umteenth time of asking, she finally got her favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: It was the umteenth rainy day in a row, making everyone feel gloomy.
meanings.sent3: He felt like the umteenth wheel on the family outing, always left out.
meanings.sent4: The umteenth drop of rain felt like tears from the sky.
meanings.sent5: The umteenth cookie she ate made her regret not stopping earlier.

meanings.definition: Denoting an unspecified ordinal number in a series.
meanings.sent1: She was tired of hearing the umteenth excuse for being late.
meanings.sent2: It was the umteenth time he had to explain the math problem to his friend.
meanings.sent3: The umteenth cup of coffee finally woke him up from his daze.
meanings.sent4: The umteenth mile of the marathon felt like an eternity.
meanings.sent5: The umteenth page of the book held the key to the mystery.
